author: Stu Woo
title: Why Sky PLC Is So Highly Prized
text:
What is so special about Sky PLC?
With three different American suitors, the British pay-TV firm has become the belle of the ball in a deals dance that could reshape the media industry.
Comcast Corp. Chief Executive Brian Roberts explained why on Tuesday, after his company disclosed it was topping 21st Century Fox Inc.â€™s bid to acquire full...
